name: Love Cubed
description:
Your gelatinous true love is killed by the so called "heroes" who have invaded your home. Time for these fools to find out just how hard it is to kill a creature with no bones, organs or skin. 

Their quest to conquer the dungeon is over, your quest for revenge has just begun!

Use WASD or arrow keys to move. Attack automatically when you collide with enemies.
